rooms.description: Spacious living area with Art Deco elements, accentuated by geometric patterns and metallic finishes. The room features an open-plan layout to accommodate social gatherings.
Compact yet efficient kitchen designed in an Art Deco style with streamlined cabinetry and retro light fixtures; integrated pantry area.
Adjacent dining area that seamlessly connects to the living room, featuring geometric-patterned flooring typical of Art Deco design.
Dedicated home office with streamlined design elements for productivity. Equipped with built-in storage and minimalistic decor reflecting Art Deco influences.
Functional bathroom designed with compact fixtures, chrome accents, and Art Deco style tiles.

openings.description: Main entrance featuring a decorative arch influenced by Art Deco motifs, ensuring proper Vastu alignment.
Balcony overlooking the garden area; designed to maximize natural light and adhere to local building norms.

levels.notes: The ground floor is planned with functional zones adhering to both budget constraints and Vastu principles. The layout ensures optimal natural lighting and ventilation by aligning the main entrance on the north side, as per traditional Vastu guidelines. Art Deco elements are integrated through geometric patterns in flooring, accents, and fixtures.
